attributes.action: Arrange with The F.A. and EUEFA to cap Footballer's wages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see footballer's wages capped so we cannot see players getting more than 50k a week, which many of them do. Ridiculous when so many of us are facing pay freezes/possible cuts.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
